When testing, you must first setup an xml file that the Store will use to simulate with. The format for the file is described here: http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/apps/windows.applicationmodel.store.currentappsimulator.aspx
If you call loadTestingLicenseXmlFile then it will trigger the plugin to use the simulator. If you do not call loadTestingLicenseXmlFile than the real store API will be used.
